item.title: OpenAI has released the GPT-5 model for programming and writing
item.description: On August 8th, OpenAI released a more powerful GPT-5 model for programming and writing. (Financial Times)

item.title: A certain whale has accumulated over $310 million worth of ETH in the past three days, with an unrealized gain of $17.88 million
item.description: On August 8th, based on Arkham's monitoring, a certain whale address has accumulated a total of $314.22 million worth of Ethereum (ETH) within the past three days. Currently, it is valued at $332.1 million, resulting in a floating profit of $17.88 million.

item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin Falls Below $116,000
item.description: On August 8th, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin dropped below $116,000 and is currently priced at $115,959, with a 24-hour price change of 0.84%.

item.title: BIO Surpasses $0.1, Up Over 65% in 24 Hours
item.description: On August 8th, according to HTX market data, BIO has surpassed $0.1 and is currently priced at $0.1003, with a 24-hour increase of 65.67%.

item.title: Crypto Derivatives Trading App Euphoria Completes $7.5M Seed Round, Lead by Karatage
item.description: August 8th. According to The Block, Euphoria, an upcoming MegaETH-based encrypted derivative trading application, has successfully completed a $7.5 million seed round of financing. The lead investor in this round is Karatage, and there are follow-on investments from Figment Capital and Robot Ventures (both of which were joint lead investors in the earlier seed round). Other participants include Bankless Ventures, First Commit, Hash3, Comfy Capital, and Kosmos Ventures, as well as more than 100 angel investors.Euphoria's co-founder and CEO, Nathan Worsley, stated that this $7.5 million financing includes a $2.5 million pre-seed round completed in November 2024 and a $5 million seed round completed from February to July of this year. The financing was carried out using Simple Agreement for Future Equity (SAFE) with attached token warrants. After the financing, Euphoria's post-money valuation reaches a "seven-figure ceiling."It is reported that Euphoria is developing a mobile applicat

item.title: In the past 24 hours, the entire network has seen $274 million in liquidations, with the majority being short positions.
item.description: On August 7th, based on Coinglass data, the total 24-hour liquidation across the network amounted to $274 million. The long liquidations totaled $58.19 million, while the short liquidations totaled $216 million.

item.title: Circle to Issue an Additional 50 Million USDC
item.description: On August 7th, based on on-chain data, Circle (USDC Treasury) minted an extra 50 million USDC on the Ethereum network at 23:16 Beijing time.

item.title: ProShares Launches 2x Leveraged ETF Tracking Circle Stock Price CRCA
item.description: August 7th. As per The Block, the fund issuer ProShares has launched the Ultra CRCL ETF (ticker: CRCA), which is a 2x leveraged ETF offering exposure to the stock of Circle Internet Group. Circle is the issuer of the second-largest stablecoin in the world, USDC.This single-stock leveraged fund began trading on NYSE Arca on August 6th, with a net asset value of $25 per share and a gross expense ratio of 1.08%.

item.title: Animoca Brands partners with ProvLabs to create cross-chain insurance vault marketplace NUVA
item.description: On August 7th, as per official information, Animoca Brands and Provenance Blockchain Labs (ProvLabs) have announced a strategic partnership today. The two parties are set to jointly develop NUVA, which is a marketplace that connects Real-World Asset (RWA) issuers with investors.NUVA will transform into a unified and cross-chain-compatible marketplace. Each marketplace within it will possess a distinct yield strategy and risk profile. Investors, encompassing retail investors, institutions, Web3 foundations, and treasuries, will be able to gain access to a wide range of investment products through NUVA in a permissionless manner.

item.title: Binance will launch YALA and CARV USDT-Margined Perpetual Contracts
item.description: On August 7th, as per an official announcement, Binance is going to list YALA and CARV perpetual contracts.
